docna.cdata!:
Bolivia - Emergency Social Fund Project :
            Credit 1829 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Bolivia - Emergency Social Fund
            Project : Credit 1829 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
This proposed operation is designed to
            support the Bolivian Government's Emergency Social Fund
            (ESF) in its efforts to address the social consequences of
            the economic crisis afflicting Bolivia since 1980. It would
            support the first year of ESF's program, which consists
            of small scale employment and income generating sub-projects
            (75% of funding) as well as social assistance sub projects
            (25% of funding). The ESF program is targeted to those
            suffering most from the effects of the crisis and the
            economic adjustment process, such as short term
            unemployment. The project would support the strengthening of
            the ESF through the testing and elaboration of the
            procedures and criteria for sub project selection
            implementation. Finally, it would provide support for
            planning the second and third years of ESF's program
            and associated monitoring mechanisms.
